meanings.definition: Adjusted in size, quantity, or degree to maintain a proper relationship
meanings.sent1: The proportionated cake slices ensured everyone got an equal piece.
meanings.sent2: The architect created a proportionated design for the new building.
meanings.sent3: The proportionated puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a proportionated mix of colors and patterns.
meanings.sent5: The proportionated garden had flowers of all sizes blooming harmoniously.

meanings.definition: Divided or distributed in a proportional manner
meanings.sent1: The proportionated candies were shared equally among the children.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together to create a proportionated distribution plan.
meanings.sent3: The proportionated pizza toppings pleased everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The proportionated sunlight filled the room with a warm glow.
meanings.sent5: The proportionated workload made the project manageable for each team member.
